thread.title: Chris Hemsworth Posts a Sweet Snap of His "Little Legends" Holding Hands
thread.title_full: Chris Hemsworth Posts a Sweet Snap of His "Little Legends" Holding Hands

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Chris Hemsworth Posts a Sweet Snap of His "Little Legends" Holding Hands
text:
Chris Hemsworth's Picture of Twins Holding Hands 2017 Chris Hemsworth Posts a Sweet Snap of His "Little Legends" Holding Hands March 7, 2017 A post shared by Chris Hemsworth (@chrishemsworth) on Mar 6, 2017 at 2:37am PST 
We just can't get enough of Chris Hemsworth's adorable little family . On Monday, the Thor actor shared a sweet moment between his twins boys, Tristan and Sasha, on Instagram as they held hands walking down Byron Bay in Australia. "My son said to his brother 'Tristan hold my hand so you don't get eaten by a crocodile' #mykids #littlelegends @australia #byronbay," he captioned the post. This isn't the first time Chris has made us melt with his fatherly moments . Last month, he proved he was superdad when he ran around the house with his kids in superhero capes.
